Description.Text:
Located in downtown San Diego in the heart of the Gaslamp Quarter, the friendly, gracious, and very helpful staff awaits your arrival. One of the most popular and unique hotels in all of San Diego, the Horton Grand is situated within 4 blocks of the San Diego Convention Center and Horton Plaza Shopping Mall. Just 6 blocks away is Petco Park and 2 miles away is the San Diego Zoo. Within easy walking distance are dozens of fun and fine cuisine restaurants. Truly reflective of the Gaslamp District, you can experience the elegance of the Victorian Era at the Horton Grand, a superbly crafted recreation of San Diego history and Victorian architecture.

No two rooms at the Horton Grand are alike, every guestroom is decorated with Victorian furnishings including armoires, marble framed gas burning fireplaces, and ceiling fans. Some rooms with balconies and desks overlooking our open-air New Orleans style courtyard or the Gaslamp district. Some rooms are very spacious boasting 600 square feet of space, sitting areas, and wet bars. In all rooms are Wireless Internet (surcharge), cable television, and complimentary toiletries.

Located in the Gaslamp Quarter of downtown San Diego, The Horton Grand Hotel is the closest luxury hotel to the San Diego Convention Center. We're centrally located near world-class shopping in Horton Plaza, diverse restaurants and nightclubs in the Gaslamp and beautiful Seaport Village. In the Gaslamp, you'll find a truly eclectic blend of food, fun, and culture--all within one of San Diego's most historic areas. Stroll past the district's other grand, historic buildings restored to their original character. The Gaslamp has something for everyone, whether you're seeking theatre, upscale shops, or fine dining.

Fireplace Room with Balcony - Fireplace Room with Balcony, with 1 king bed and balcony, includes full bathroom, armoire, alarm clock, fireplace, radio, telephone, iron and ironing board, cable TV and wireless internet (surcharge). Horton Grand Hotel is a 100% non-smoking property.
Grand King Room - Grand King Room with 1 king bed and a sofa sleeper, an oversized room with sitting area, table and a wet bar with a coffee maker, refrigerator and microwave. Victorian style furnishings, gas burning fireplace, ceiling fan and wireless internet access (surcharge). Horton Grand Hotel is a 100% non-smoking property.
Fireplace Room - Fireplace Room, with 1 queen bed, includes full bathroom, armoire, alarm clock, fireplace, radio, telephone, iron and ironing board, cable TV and wireless internet (surcharge). Horton Grand Hotel is a 100% non-smoking property.
